description:
World of Warriors is an epic combat and adventure strategy game! Journey across the Wildlands and amass an army of history's greatest warriors, from Romans and Vikings to Knights and Samurai. Battle the mighty Skull Army and defeat evil King Boneshaker and his menacing bosses!

PLEASE NOTE! World of Warriors is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Fight, Train and Evolve your Army in the epic World of Warriors!

5/5 “There is nothing quite like World of Warriors in mobile gaming today”

5/5 “Beautiful artwork, an immersive and well thought-out game world, accessible gameplay with a real layer of strategic depth and planning... World of Warriors has it all.”

= FEATURES =

- FREE TO PLAY
- Stunningly beautiful 3D graphics, amazing sound design and AAA production values and polish.
- Amass an awesome army of historically accurate real-life warriors.
- Unleash mind-blowing special attacks on your fearsome opponents.
- Battle through the Wildlands to defeat the evil Boneshaker and his legion of minions and bosses.
- Collect materials and craft powerful Talismans to tip the tides of battle in your favor.
- Train and Evolve your Warriors to reach the highest heights and unlock the true potential and power of your army.
- Daily and Weekly events to take part in.
- Compete against others for rare and exclusive prizes.

= DEVICE SUPPORT =
This game is compatible with iPhone 4S and above, and iPad 2 and above. However, for the following devices, we recommend that players clear all notifications and re-start their device for the optimal playing experience:
- iPad 2
- iPad Mini
- iPhone 4S
- All iPod Touches

= COMMUNITY AND SOCIAL =
Check out the official World of Warriors forums and help us continue to develop the game!
http://forums.worldofwarriors.com/

Our official Facebook page with news, behind the scenes and much more!
https://www.facebook.com/WorldOfWarriors

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at: support@WorldOfWarriors.com.

Terms of Service: http://mindcandy.com/tos/
Privacy Policy: http://mindcandy.com/privacy/

You can connect with friends and family in this game via Facebook and it is designed for a general audience. It is a 'Free to Play' game, but you have the option to spend real money for extra content. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device's settings. May contain advertising. 
 
World of Warriors and all related elements © and ™ 2014 Mind Candy Limited. All rights reserved.
releaseNotes: Fixed an issue that prevented some players from progressing in the game.
